name: SpaceCraft (itch) (stumpybean)
description:
Engine: Unity

Music: Created using Soundtrap - Free account

SFX: Created using Audacity

Graphics: Created using Inkscape

Everything was created during the game jam by myself.

This is an entry for JamCraft5 - with the theme Alien.

I didn't get to implement how the Grabber Alien works so that is the end of the game really.  I didn't get to implement alot of things I wanted to but the crafting and questing systems are working.  To craft you need to first learn the recipes from quests, then click on the crafting machine at your base to start crafting.  Once you hit start crafting, you cannot cancel the crafting.  Only 1 item is crafted at each crafting station at one time.  Once it is created pick it up by wlaking over to it and pressing e. Once it is collected the next item in the queue will begin.

More instructions are giving in game in the quests. 

To move use W,A,S,D or the arrow keys.  Use E to interact with objects.  Hover over signs with your mouse to get a pop up of what it says. 

If you get stuck with a red object when you are building just hit the right mouse button to clear the object.   An object can be placed if it isnt highlighted red.

Make sure you hand in quests when the ? is green.  You can use items from your inventory by clicking on them. Some of the items don't have a function other than being in recipes so they won't do anything when you click on them.
